alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 8:14PM EDT until July 13 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Orange County in southeastern New York... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 814 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greeley, or 9 miles west of Montague, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Port Jervis and Huguenot around 900 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
